title: Open Text Question
description: Schema for q{NN}.open_text.{lang}.json — free-text question files.

text.description: The question text displayed to the student.

min_words.description: Minimum number of words required in the student's answer.

max_length.description: Maximum character length of the student's answer.

correct_answer.description: Reference answer used by the AI evaluator for scoring.

explanation.description: Explanation shown to the student after submission (when show_explanations is true).

image_url.description: Optional image URL displayed alongside the question.

ai_context.description: Additional context sent to the AI evaluator for this question.

ai_suggestions.description: Pre-authored AI suggestions with associated scores.

text.description: Suggestion text shown to the student.
